dcterms:description: A dataset used to assess the reliability and diagnostic performance of CT imaging criteria in the diagnosis of tuberculous meningitis.
dcterms:title: Reliability and diagnostic performance of CT imaging criteria in the diagnosis of tuberculous meningitis
